questions.questionText: What is the purpose of this document?
Who are the stakeholders involved?
What is the overall objective or intended outcome from the meeting?
Provide a brief overview/introduction of the implementation partner?
What is the implementation partner's expertise relevant to this project?
Mention any notable experience or similar past projects?
What is the scope of the project and what are the key deliverables?
What are the main business processes and functional areas included in the NetSuite implementation scope?
Which NetSuite modules or features will be implemented as part of this project (e.g., Financials, CRM, Inventory)?
Are there specific departments, locations, or business units that this project will cover?
What key objectives or outcomes define the scope of this implementation (what will a successful project include)?
What are the key deliverables?
Which NetSuite modules and features are included for configuration (e.g., General Ledger, Accounts Payable, Order Management, Inventory, CRM)?
What business process configurations will be done (e.g., approval workflows, custom fields/forms, roles)?
Will there be any custom development or SuiteScript coding required? If so, what functionalities will they handle?
Are there any third-party bundles in the scope (e.g., SuiteApps or connectors)?
What NetSuite environments will be utilized (e.g., production, sandbox)?
Is a dedicated testing/staging environment planned before go-live?
How will configuration/customization be migrated across environments?
Are there any constraints like sandbox refresh or downtime for go-live?
What legacy systems or sources are in scope for data migration?
Which data elements will be migrated (e.g., master data, open transactions)?
How much historical data will be migrated?
Who is responsible for data cleansing and mapping?
Are there any formatting/data quality issues to address before migration?
